channel.title: I can identify that you are whonix user with 95% accuracy.
channel.description: Whonix resolution (1024x768) is very rare https://www.w3schools.com/browsers/browsers_display.asp http://gs.statcounter.com/screen-resolution-stats Why this choice? To not require scrolling if someone runs Whonix on 1366x768 laptop? This choice makes whonix users stand out from TBB users. it's extremely easy to identify them If you enable javascript, they will read TBB window size. it's trivial to read screen resolution from TBB window size. Nobody runs TBB on 1024x768 screen, except... whonix users.

item.title: I can identify that you are whonix user with 95% accuracy.

item.description:
Which platform?

Similar to, applies:

anon7138409:

To not require scrolling if someone runs Whonix on 1366x768 laptop?

No.

item.title: I can identify that you are whonix user with 95% accuracy.
item.dc:creator: anon7138409
item.description:
Whonix resolution (1024x768) is very rare
https://www.w3schools.com/browsers/browsers_display.asp

StatCounter Global Stats

Screen Resolution Stats Worldwide | StatCounter Global Stats

This graph shows the stats of screen resolutions worldwide based on over 10 billion monthly page views.


Why this choice? To not require scrolling if someone runs Whonix on 1366x768 laptop?
This choice makes whonix users stand out from TBB users. it’s extremely easy to identify them
If you enable javascript, they will read TBB window size. it’s trivial to read screen resolution from TBB window size. Nobody runs TBB on 1024x768 screen, except… whonix users.

Read full topic
item.source: I can identify that you are whonix user with 95% accuracy.
